subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous lake is located in Udaipur?
question_hi: उदयपुर में कौन सा महान पालक है।
explanation_en:
Fateh Sagar Lake is a famous lake located in Udaipur.
फतेह सागर पालक उदयपुर में है।
explanation_hi: फतेह सागर पालक, उदयपुर में है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following forts is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जैनी में कुछ वर्ग कौन है।
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous palace located in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: हावा महाल, जैनी शहर में है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaisalmer?
question_hi: जयसालमर में कौने वर्षियाँ वर्ग कौनी है।
explanation_en:
Sammera Fort is a famous fort located in Jaisalmer.
जयसालमर वर्ग, उसका महली है।
explanation_hi: सामरा वर्ग, उसकी मंदिर, जयसालमर वर्ग का महली है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which traditional dance form is famous in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्तानेवाल के संसागाँ का प्रान्तियाँ का आमन है।
explanation_en:
Garba is a traditional dance form that is famous in Rajasthan.
राजस्तानेवाँ का आमन है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which palace is known as the 'Palace of Forbidden
question_hi: बिली कौोलियाँ का कोलोलोलियाँ का नयाँ
explanation_en: Kumbhali Fort is a famous fort located in Jaisamal Fort.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Jaisamal?
explanation_en: Neem Mahal is a famous palace located in Jaisamal.

subject: Rajasthana
question_en: Which fort is popular in Jaisamal?
explanation_en: Amer Fort is popular in Jaipur.
